amendment.description: Amendment sought to limit DOD funding to the amount authorized under the Budget Control Act of 2011, resulting in an $8 billion reduction in spending from the level authorized by the House Armed Services Committee.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 42 printed in House Report 112-485 to limit DOD funding to the amount authorized under the Budget Control Act of 2011, resulting in an $8 billion reduction in spending from the level authorized by the House Armed Services Committee.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 170 - 252 (Roll no. 282).
